title: Troubling Video From Outside The Rittenhouse Trial (Ep 1650)
description:
Why are leftist thugs promoting violence in Kenosha as we await the Rittenhouse verdict? Watch the stunning videos we expose during the show. 

News Picks:

2022 is looking apocalyptic for the Democrats.

What! The FBI is monitoring parents at school boards? 


What percentage of Democrats believe Rittenhouse shot a black man? 


Half of liberals believe 1,000 or more unarmed black men were shot by police.


A major update in the “whipgate” case.
